ccdhmodel

CRDC-H model in LinkML, developed by the Center for Cancer Data Harmonization (CCDH)

This project is maintained by cancerDHC

Class: CodeableConcept

URI: types:CodeableConcept

Referenced by class

  • None ➞type OPT CodeableConcept

Attributes

Own

  • ➞coding 0..*
    • Description: A reference to a code defined by a terminology system
    • range: Coding
  • ➞text OPT
    • Description: A human language representation of the concept represented by the Coding
    • range: String
